001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli;
002
003
004import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
005import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
006
007/**
008 * Command-line options for JSON-RPC tool
009 */
010public class JsonRpcToolOptions extends Options {
011    public JsonRpcToolOptions() {
012        super();
013        this.addOption("?", "help", false, "This help message")
014            .addOption((Option.builder("v")
015                    .longOpt("verbose")
016                    .desc("Print verbose output (log-level = 3/INFO")
017                    .build()))
018            .addOption((Option.builder()
019                    .longOpt("log")
020                    .desc("log-level (0-5: OFF, SEVERE, WARNING, INFO, FINE, ALL)")
021                    .hasArg()
022                    .argName("level")
023                    .build()))
024            .addOption(Option.builder()
025                    .longOpt("V1")
026                    .desc("Send '1.0' in the request 'jsonrpc' field as the JSON-RPC version")
027                    .build())
028            .addOption(Option.builder("u")
029                    .longOpt("url")
030                    .desc("URL for the JSON-RPC endpoint")
031                    .hasArg()
032                    .argName("url")
033                    .build())
034            .addOption(Option.builder()
035                    .longOpt("add-truststore")
036                    .desc("Additional truststore")
037                    .hasArg()
038                    .argName("path")
039                    .build())
040            .addOption(Option.builder()
041                    .longOpt("alt-truststore")
042                    .desc("Alternate truststore (password must be 'changeit')")
043                    .hasArg()
044                    .argName("path")
045                    .build())
046            .addOption(Option.builder()
047                    .longOpt("response")
048                    .desc("Output entire JsonRpcResponse, not just the result")
049                    .build())
050            // Bitcoin-CLI style options
051            .addOption(Option.builder()
052                    .longOpt("rpcconnect")
053                    .desc("Send commands to node running on <ip> (default: 127.0.0.1)")
054                    .hasArg()
055                    .argName("ip")
056                    .build())
057            .addOption(Option.builder()
058                    .longOpt("rpcport")
059                    .desc("Connect to JSON-RPC on <port> (default: 8080)")
060                    .hasArg()
061                    .argName("port")
062                    .build())
063            .addOption(Option.builder()
064                    .longOpt("rpcuser")
065                    .desc("Username for JSON-RPC connections")
066                    .hasArg()
067                    .argName("user")
068                    .build())
069            .addOption(Option.builder()
070                    .longOpt("rpcpassword")
071                    .desc("Password for JSON-RPC connections")
072                    .hasArg()
073                    .argName("pw")
074                    .build())
075            .addOption(null, "rpcssl", false, "Use https for JSON-RPC connections");
076    }
077
078}
